title: Hannah Montana - Songs from and Inspired by the Hit TV Series: Recorder Fun! Pack
description: (Recorder). This terrific pack contains everything you need to teach yourself recorder, using songs from this Disney Channel sensation! Features a high-quality instrument with the feel and tuning of a pro model; and a songbook featuring easy versions of nine popular songs, complete instructions, a fingering chart, and coloring pages. Includes these Hannah Montana hits in E-Z Play The Best of Both Worlds * Find Yourself in You * I Got Nerve * Just like You * Life's What You Make It * Nobody's Perfect * One in a Million * The Other Side of Me * We Got the Party. Many other Hannah Montana editions also available!
author: Miley Cyrus
